headline: Could Investing $10,000 in O'Reilly Automotive Make You a Millionaire?
summary: O'Reilly Automotive is an auto parts retailer with a rapidly expanding business.  If O'Reilly can keep expanding its store footprint, it should be able to keep growing its earnings.  O'Reilly Automotive (NASDAQ: ORLY) operates a fairly boring business selling auto parts to consumers and commercial customers.

content.title: Could Investing $10,000 in O'Reilly Automotive Make You a Millionaire?

headline: Macy's is in tight 'race to the bottom' with retail competitors
summary: On the latest installment of Good Buy or Goodbye, Washington Crossing Advisors senior portfolio manager Chad Morganlander joins Market Domination host Julie Hyman to expand upon his bullish take on auto part retailer O'Reilly Automotive (ORLY) amid tariffs and his bearish view on Macy's (M) tied to the store's competition and debt holdings. Department store chain topped first quarter estimates on its top and bottom lines on Wednesday, posting revenue of $4.6 billion (vs. estimates of $4.46 billion) and adjusted earnings of $0.16 per share (vs. estimates of $0.14). On top of its quarterly results, Macy's cut its full-year profit outlook, citing tariff pressures and a more cautious consumer. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination here. Don't forget to catch up on more Good Buy or Goodbye.

content.title: Macy's is in tight 'race to the bottom' with retail competitors
content.description:
On the latest installment of Good Buy or Goodbye, Washington Crossing Advisors senior portfolio manager Chad Morganlander joins Market Domination host Julie Hyman to expand upon his bullish take on auto part retailer O'Reilly Automotive (ORLY) amid tariffs and his bearish view on Macy's (M) tied to the store's competition and debt holdings.

Department store chain topped first quarter estimates on its top and bottom lines on Wednesday, posting revenue of $4.6 billion (vs. estimates of $4.46 billion) and adjusted earnings of $0.16 per share (vs. estimates of $0.14). On top of its quarterly results, Macy's cut its full-year profit outlook, citing tariff pressures and a more cautious consumer.

To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market DominationÂ here. Don't forget to catch up on more Good Buy or Goodbye.

On top of its quarterly results, Macy's cut its full-year profit outlook, citing tariff pressures and a more cautious consumer.
